page.title: 11OUR FAVOURITE GAMES
page.content: DAVID'S FAVOURITE GAME "My favourite game is called 'bung-off'. This is better if it is played in the dark although we need to take care of the traffic. The rules are that one person stands at base, closes his eyes and counts to 500 in tens. The other people go and hide somewhere in a certain area. The person who counts then goes to look for the other people. When he/she finds someone they have a race back to base. If the person who counts wins then the other person has to count the next time they play. RUSSELL'S FAVOURITE GAME is 'kerby' "you pick a number and the lst. person to get that number is the winner. You have to throw the ball at the kerb and if it hits it you get one point,if you throw the ball over your head and hit the kerb you get 5 points.
